entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 27. POP 70%
